ingredients.content: 150 g onions, cut into quarters (1 onion)
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
2 - 3 tbsp Parmesan cheese, shaved, to garnish

preparations.content: Place onions, garlic and oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Sauté <b>2 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add bacon and sauté again <b>3 min/120°C//speed 1<b>.
Add tomato purée, tinned tomatoes, water and smoked paprika then cook <b>7 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.

Add salt, pepper, then spaghetti through hole in mixing bowl lid. Cook <b>according to time on packet/100°C//speed 1<b>. If pasta is not cooked, leave to sit for up to 5 minutes. Serve hot with Parmesan shavings sprinkled on top.
